review_blob:
The flavour of this pilsener isnt bad at all, the first taste is fresh, zesty , maybe slightly lemony, but all in al a wellrounded main flavour..it has a very distinct hop aftertaste,BUT there seems to be something gravely wring with the gas production of this particular label.
No other beer produces such nasty amount of burps.
Amste;, Bavaria, Pirlsner Urquell , Grolsch, are similar of taste or quality in one way or another, and do not make one so gassy... That is why after some sampling I will abstain from this very label.
